logs.message: HinweisCache wird ungefÃ¤hr um 01.05.2017 wegen Umzug archiviert.

[#4702] 16:46After long and winding brain activity I eventually had the coordinates, but the cache had not been there. OK, shelved and onto the watch list.Yay, itâ€™s reactivated!But, when to go?Turns out today after the â€œreallyâ€? last ice cream of the year, it was.Took us long enough (even TJ TEMBO! did not really help much) to spot it, we had heard wild boars really close nearby during the search already, *and* given up, but Turodagnir insisted we check one more tree stump on the way back, et voilÃ  there it is.Fitting container. Nice Ã¸l. Prost!Oh and, Turodagnir wants me to say that this also involved long and winding bodily activityâ€¦

Ja, und schlieÃŸlich, war der Cache . Das gar jungfrÃ¤uliche neue Logbuch verzierten wir mit unseren Namen und versteckten das groÃŸe Gebinde wieder ordentlich an den dafÃ¼r vorgesehenen Platz.T4TC
